Text.Page:
I know Castanica is worried about durignite for their shields, but they're running short on metals needed for the war effort, too.

Shadmetal ore in particular is in short supply.

The good news is that you don't need to excavate an entire mine to get to itâ€”many shadmetal deposits break through to the surface. Bring me some shadmetal ore, and all of Castanica will shout your praises.
With the mines shut down, Castanica is in crisis. Every little bit of shadmetal helps, friend!
